text: Which of the following is true about the dehiscence of the anther?

options.a: Dehiscence occurs when the anther splits open to release pollen grains.
options.b: Dehiscence is when the anther absorbs water.
options.c: Dehiscence results in the formation of the ovule.

hint: The dehiscence of the anther is the process through which the pollen grains are released)
